name: The Job Interview (davebertaud)
description:
I made this game when I was in a pretty dark place (and hating my job). I was fed up with workplace politics and thought I should make a game to vent out my frustrations.

Anyway, enjoy this little job interview simulator. Hopefully, you get a chuckle out of it. And if you don't, you can pm me and tell me how much I suck. Either way, I love you! xoxoxoxo

Love, 

Dave Bertaud

@davebertaud
